Reviews/Synopsis
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please go to the following website for detailed information:
 <a href="
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fire_Dragon" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fire_Dragon</a>

  Attempting to vie for power the evil Prince Six and his masked assassin the Flame Devil plot to kill the Prime Minister. Amidst fire and destruction the Fiery Dragon Team and the Imperial guard team together to extinguish the flame of the evil prince.
 Ah Hsia is a mercenary working for the evil Sixth Prince, who sent her on a mission to destroy evidence of the prince's betrayal to the emperor. The only thing standing in Hsia's way is a young man who has the evidence.
 To get the priceless paper-evidence, Hsia pretends to be an innocent woman hurt in the woods, still intending to get the evidence at any cost. However, when she becomes more involved with everyday people who welcomes her into their homes, Hsia changes from a cold-hearted killer to a heart-warming woman.
 The sixth prince, after discovering Hsia's moral changes, orders her best friend to finish Hsia. Hsia accidentally kills her best friend/sister, and is determined to keep her good side. With some help from a couple of chivalrous "friends", Hsia duels his former master in an explosive finale.
